newsitem.title: UK: Liberty Mutual to set up N.Irish software firm.
newsitem.headline: Liberty Mutual to set up N.Irish software firm.

text.p: U.S. financial services company Liberty Mutual Group is to establish a new company in the Belfast area, Northern Ireland economy minister Baroness Denton said on Thursday.
The new company, Liberty Information Technology Ltd, will develop insurance software programmes for internal use by Liberty Mutual, Denton said in a statement.
The 3.5 million pound project, backed by Northern Ireland's Industrial Development Board, should provide 124 new jobs over the next five years, she said.
"This is a strategically important investment for Northern Ireland by a major U.S. financial services corporation," Denton said.
